description: Chip List Item Component which can be used to show the list of chips and can be edited to add new chips

inputs.name: chips
inputs.description: contains the list of chips that needs to be shown on the component

inputs.name: readOnly
inputs.description: Defines whether new chip item can be added or not

inputs.name: options
inputs.description: contains the list of chips that can be shown as an option and can be selected from that option list

inputs.name: iconName
inputs.description: suffix icon that needs to be added to the chip item component

inputs.name: placeholder
inputs.description: plsceholder for the input component when chips are editable

inputs.name: color
inputs.description: to specify the color for the chips

output.name: onAdd
output.description: list of updated chips item emitted

output.name: onRemove
output.description: list of updated chips item emitted
